basics.name: Tyler Cho
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2024.

highlights: Aided students with understanding complex topics in a digestible manner
Tracked student progress to assess and improve my own approach to tutoring
Improved students' grades by an average of two letter grades
Offered students pursuing a Computer Science degree advice regarding coursework, study habits, and expectations
Guided students towards a better understanding of solutions and the reasoning behind them
Assisted customers with selecting clothing appropriate for their situations
Replenished and organized inventory on sales floor with efficiency
Maintained visually appealing merchandise displays on mannequins for customer viewing
Patrolled premises to monitor establishments during late night hours
Checked locks and windows at regular intervals to identify evidence of tampering
Kept written logs of visitors on premises for record-keeping and reporting purposes
Answered phone calls, handling various inquiries and organized reservations
Greeted and escorted dining guests to their designated tables
Provided guests with a warm and calm attitude in a fast-paced environment
